The Android Development Tools (ADT)
ADT tools The Android Development Tools (ADT) project provide Eclipse and IntellJ based tooling to development Android applications.
Unfortunately the ADT team were not available for an interview. Most of documentation of the tooling can be found under here: http://tools.android.com/[Tool project side] .
Contributing to the ADT project
The contribution process to ADT is based on Gerrit but uses another tool called repo. The contribution process is described here: http://tools.android.com/contributing[Contributing to ADT] .
Building the tools
How to build the Eclipse based ADT tooling is described in the following page: http://tools.android.com/build/eclipse[Building ADT] .
